name: The Gardener and the Wild Vine
name_original: The Gardener and the Wild Vine
description:
The Gardener and the Wild Vine is an entry for the GMTK Jam 2020: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020.

The theme was "Out of Control",  and in this game:

  • We the developers did not have control over where the platforms are in this platformer
  • The vines that help you climb the tower are out of control as well, branching and splitting every time you collect a flower

Climb the tower and collect flowers along the way!
